entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:04 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
